Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Another cool start to another day, in the dark of the artium of the quarters they were usually hidden in.  He looked out over the city, reclined back in a low reclining seat, revelling in the silence.  His chrome finish shone bright as the sun slowly rose in the window, lighting up the buildings and streets.  He sighed a bit, wondering how long she was going to sleep.
 
Malice got up from his seat and went to the chamber they shared and went to the femme's side, sitting down carefully.  She was so peaceful in her sleep, a contrast to how they were when they were on assignment.  They were forgotten by society now, the ones who solved problems mysteriously and saved the world all the time.  A perfect job for an unlikely couple.
 
"Wolfblade.....Wolfblade~" he cooed softly a few inches from her face, leaning over her to greet her as the first thing she sees.



"HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is your power and skill now?  You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!" 

		
---------------------------------
